warnings.warning: Server Operators: If you select ReCubed, your players MUST also use it, other wise they cannot join the server.

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: The backbone of modded Minecraft.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft.

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: ChickenBones' mods Library File.

mod.name: Commons-Codec
mod.description: Commons Library Files

mod.name: Commons-Compress
mod.description: Commons Library Files

mod.name: ForgeMultipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: ForgeRelocation
mod.description: Move blocks from one place to another.

mod.name: RelocationFMP
mod.description: Adds FMP support to ForgeRelocation.

mod.name: libsandstone
mod.description: Sandstone, the foundation for pyramids. Another modding framework.

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Core libs and utilities

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: Various Extensions for Applied Energistics 2

mod.name: AgriCraft
mod.description: Agricultural farming extended

mod.name: AnimationAPI
mod.description: A supporting mod that allows modders to make animations more easily.

mod.name: Another One Bites The Dust
mod.description: AOBD dynamically finds all the ores and ingots added by any mod and makes them processable in IC2, EnderIO, RailCraft, Mekanism, Thermal Expansion, Thaumcraft, UltraTech, Factorization, RandomAdditions, Gany's Nether, Modular Systems, Hydraulicraft, Tinker's Construct, SimpleOreGrinder, RotaryCraft, Electrical Age, Aura Cascade, Flaxbeard's Steampower Mod, Engineer's Toolbox, and Immersive Engineering machines!

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: asielib
mod.description: Utilities for asie's mods

mod.name: Automagy
mod.description: An addon for Thaumcraft 4 focused on providing flexible and interesting tools for automation and logistics, plus a few other fun thaumic gadgets.

mod.name: Backpack
mod.description: Provides the player with multiple, colored backpacks, which each has the space of a normal chest.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power.

mod.name: The BigTrees Mod
mod.description: Adds larger trees to Minecraft, enhancing dimensional complexity and atmophsere.

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used bu most of my mods from now on

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: BuildCraft Additions
mod.description: BuildCraft Additions is a mod for Minecraft which extends BuildCraft in multiple ways.

mod.name: Calculator
mod.description: Whoever said Calculators were boring?! Awesome Calculators, crazy items, mind-blowing machines and hundreds of hidden recipes. Change the way you craft, change the way you play, change the way you think. Development has slowed down now, but I'm still welcoming ideas to improve the mod though! Thank you for trying Calculator!

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management Credits: Sanguine - Texture Supporters:

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: Chisel Facades
mod.description: Adds Chisel's blocks as Buildcraft Facades.

mod.name: Chisel Tones
mod.description: Chisel compatibility for Ztones

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Base common code for all chickenbones mods.

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: CoFHLib
mod.description: Library/API required by all CoFH mods. It's also meant as a resource for other modders!

mod.name: Compacter
mod.description: Rapidly compacts items that can be crafted in 2x2 or 3x3 pattern

mod.name: CompactStorage
mod.description: Adding new storage solutions to your world!

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: Computronics
mod.description: A ComputerCraft/OpenComputers addon mod.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Dark Menagerie
mod.description: A bunch of exotic creatrues that would very much love to kill you

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Adds 500+ models to decorate your Minecraft world.

mod.name: Dense Ores
mod.description: Adds new ore variants to the game

mod.name: Dimensional Anchors
mod.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: Draconic Evolution is a mod that adds some extremely expensive high tier items to the game.

mod.name: Dynamic Dynamos
mod.description: Adds fancy animations to ThermalExpansion dynamos.

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: Connect your server or client to IRC and Twitch Chat and easily share your screenshots with other players.

mod.name: Emotes
mod.description: Wave! Dance! Facepalm! Emotes Mod! Try /emote list for a list of emotes.

mod.name: Enchiridion 2
mod.description: Custom books in minecraft!

mod.name: Ender Compass
mod.description: The ender compass is an item that leads to strongholds.

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Ender IO Addons
mod.description: Additional machines for Ender IO.

mod.name: EnderStorage
mod.description: Stores your stuff in the END! Credits: Ecu - original idea, design, chest and pouch texture Rosethorns - tank model Soaryn - tank texture Supporters: Blkdragon112

mod.name: EnderTech
mod.description: Ender themed technological expansion.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: More Mobs

mod.name: EnhancedPortals
mod.description: An advanced technological portal teleportation system

mod.name: Eureka
mod.description: Knowledge system based on 'learning as you go'

mod.name: Ex Astris
mod.description: Ex Nihilo Addon

mod.name: Ex Nihilo
mod.description: The Skyblock Companion Mod

mod.name: Extra Cells 2
mod.description: Adds new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE 2.

mod.name: ExtraTiC
mod.description: An Addon-Mod adds cross compatibility for Tinker's Construct

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of useful things

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: Forbidden Magic
mod.description: Forbidden Magic is an addon to add many dark-themed things to Thaumcraft.

mod.name: Forestry for Minecraft
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Gany's End
mod.description: This is one of the three mods in the Gany's Mods collection. Gany's End adds blocks and functionalities related to the end (duh). Decorate your house with a better looking End Stone! or use Ender Pearls bricks! Use blocks to teleport other blocks! Make blocks disappear! Have an infinite bucket with all the water you'll need! Or behead your enemies using a scythe and gather their heads!

mod.name: Gany's Nether
mod.description: This is one of the three mods in the Gany's Mods collection. Gany's Nether adds new blocks and functionalities related to the Nether (duh). Tired of lurking around the Nether looking for glowstone, nether quartz or soul sand? Why not... plant them? Too many rubbish around? melt it down into useful lava that you can pipe out using Buildcraft pipes!

mod.name: Gany's Surface
mod.description: This is one of the three mods in the Gany's Mods collection. Gany's Surface adds blocks and functionalities related to the over world (duh). Poop everywhere! Detect when is raining, make armour out of wood, and have a nice cup of tea in the morning before going mining, just don't put the milk in first!

mod.name: Garden Stuff
mod.description: Make your gardens and landscaping beautiful with multi-part plants, decorative planters, and more.

mod.name: GenDustry
mod.description: Adds industrial apiaries, advanced genetic manipulation and mutation (Forestry addon)

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: Grimoire of Gaia 3
mod.description: Adds mobs, monsters and monster girls.

mod.name: Growthcraft Community Edition
mod.description: A continuation of Gwafu's Growthcraft

mod.name: Guide-API
mod.description: Simple mod guide creation.

mod.name: Hardcore Ender Expansion
mod.description: Overhauls the End with many new areas to explore, bosses to fight and rewards to gain.

mod.name: Hardcore Questing Mode
mod.description: This mod will add Hardcore mode with extra lives. If you use up your lives, your world will be deleted or you will be banned.

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Immersive Integration
mod.description: Integrates IE with other mods, as well as some useful addition to IE itself

mod.name: INpureCore
mod.description: Core mod for all INpure mods

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: Iron Chest Minecarts
mod.description: Minecarts for all the chests added by Iron Chests!

mod.name: IvToolkit
mod.description: Versatile mod framework

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Moar barrels The Jabba team would like to thank the Academy for this award... oh wait... *cough* erm... Credits to neptunepink for the original barrel idea, Q and his community for the name, special thanks to skyboy for rendering assistance and the DSU, and the many people whom have made modded MC such an awesome thing to be a part of.

mod.name: Java version Checker
mod.description: Nobody ever sees this!

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: Kore Sample
mod.description: Kore Sample provides a set of tools and base classes for other Minecraft mods that depend on it.

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes,...

mod.name: LunatriusCore
mod.description: A collection of utilities for Lunatrius' mods.

mod.name: Magical Crops: Core
mod.description: A Magical farming mod that allows you to grow and harvest all type of Minecraft resources, and make many magical items and armours. Also a massive thank you to the Painterly Pack team for giving me permission to use and edit some of there fantastic Minecraft textures!

mod.name: Magical Crops: Armoury
mod.description: Armour and Weapon addon for Magical Crops 4!

mod.name: Magical Crops: Decorative
mod.description: Magical Crop addon, adds many decorative blocks to your world!

mod.name: Magic Bees
mod.description: Magic themed bee expansion for Forestry. TC4, Botania, EE3, AM 2, TE 3

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mod.name: Minefactory Reloaded
mod.description: MFR aims to automate a number of tasks that previously would be difficult, boring, or work-intensive.

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: More Chisels
mod.description: More chisels for Chisel

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mod.description: Addons for Not Enough Items for various mods

mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: Nether Ores

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Recipe Viewer, Inventory Manager, Item Spawner, Cheats and more

mod.name: NotEnoughKeys

mod.name: Not Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to NEI

mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft

mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Compatibility module for Project Red.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.description: Bringing the router back in 1.7.x

mod.description: A Minecraft mod that adds a few small tweaks to the game.

mod.description: Solar Panels producing Redstone Flux

mod.description: Adds extra things to improve SFM

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: Steve's Factory Manager is a mod which allows you to set up systems that moves and manages items between inventories and machines

mod.name: Steve's Workshop
mod.description: Adds a modular production table for crafting and smelting

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Technomancy
mod.description: Science and magic. What could go wrong?

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: NEI Integration for Thaumcraft 4.

mod.name: Thaumic Energistics
mod.description: The digital age could use some magic

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT].

mod.name: Thermal Dynamics
mod.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: Thermal Smeltery
mod.description: Smelt your metals in the Magma Crucible for Molten Metals!

mod.name: TiC Tooltips
mod.description: A simple client-side add-on for Tinkers' Construct that adds relevant stats to all tool part tooltips.

mod.name: Tinkers' Mechworks
mod.description: Mechanically inclined Tinkers' Construct expansion

mod.name: Translocator
mod.description: Translocates stuff! Credits: MouseCop - Textures Supporters:

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: All your data are belong to us.

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: WAILA Plugins
mod.description: WAILA plugins for various mods, such as Blood Magic, Magical Crops, and Forestry!

mod.name: Water Hooks
mod.description: Adds Event for Infinite Water Source Forming

mod.name: What Are We Looking At
mod.description: Greatly expands upon the functionality of Waila by providing many new forms of information along with bridging support between Waila and many other popular minecraft mods.

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Bringing witchcraft and nature magic to Minecraft: cauldrons, broomsticks, ritual circles, magical brews, a bit of necromancy and voodoo for good measure; all topped off with a fetching pointy hat. Oh, and watch out for the demons...

mod.name: WR-CBE-Universal
mod.description: The combined WR-CBE mod

mod.name: YUNoMakeGoodMap
mod.description: Adds a new World type option to generate nothing except for a inital spawn platform, useful for creative players who want to make Skyblock style maps. 2.0 reduces the spawn zone to 1 block, 2.1 is updated to 1.5.2 and srg names, *should* never need a update again ;)

mod.name: Ztones
mod.description: Decorative Blocks

mod.name: === Optional ===
mod.description: Select me to activate ALL mods in Optional.

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Bringing witchcraft and nature magic to Minecraft: cauldrons, broomsticks, ritual circles, magical brews, a bit of necromancy and voodoo for good measure; all topped off with a fetching pointy hat. Oh, and watch out for the demons...

mod.name: == Server Mods ==
mod.description: Server Mods

mod.name: == Client Mods ==
mod.description: Client Mods

mod.name: CoFHTweaks
mod.description: Various performance improvements

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: An IRC Connector that works both on clients and servers independently, with some neat special features.

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: Journey Map
mod.description: JourneyMap is a client mod for Forge which maps your Minecraft world in real-time as you explore. You can view the map in a web browser or in-game as a Minimap or full-screen.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: Adds inventory based item dragging and more!

mod.name: ReCubed
mod.description: A mod that tracks all sorts of stats.

mod.name: TC Node Tracker
mod.description: Tracks scanned nodes for Thaumcraft

mod.name: TickProfiler
mod.description: A small mod for servers to assist with finding which TileEntities(machines) and Entities are being slow.

mod.name: Voxel Map
mod.description: Radar, Waypoints, Cave Mode... in a neat and clean package.

mod.name: == Dev Only ==
mod.description: Please do not select with Era modes.

mod.name: MineTweakerRecipeMaker
mod.description: MineTweaker Recipe Maker

mod.name: Torcherino
mod.description: Time Torches that won't kill your server.

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.
